title: CAPTAIN
text: Sail on cool waters with expandable ship that crew will catch $FISH Grab the ship by the ship’s rudder. An upgradeable ship is to Captain what the bitcoin means to SATOSHI NAKAMOTO!

title: $FISH
text: Sand in the desert, $FISH in the sea... Start your $FISHing adventure in small seaside towns. The governance and utility token of the fishing ecosystem. Hold, use or sell on the open market.

title: $YARD
text: $YARD is needed to tow the Ship to the Dock and increase the Ship's capacity. You can get $YARD by freezing (stake) $FISH or you can buy $YARD from the market.

title: Catch
text: The crew who is excited will sail to the sea and will catch $fish. The crew catch more $FISH with upgraded ship which has more capacity.

title: Freeze
text: Bring $FISH to the freezer. (stake) Freeze it and collect $YARD which required to increase ship capacity. Frozen $FISH can be stored for a long time in the refrigerator without spoiling.

title: Capacity
text: From the fishing boat to become ruler of the sea… $YARD permanently increases capacity of the ship. It’s written straight to the metadata of your NFT.
